|rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The default SSID patterns appear to be '''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G'''. :The USB ID of the on-board BCM43236 is 0a5c:bd17. ===Bundled power supply=== The power supply included with the device is :a '''Leader Electronics''' MT18-9120150-A1. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = Leader Electronics |model = MT18-9120150-A1 |revision = (NETGEAR 332-10221-01) |countrymanuf = China |input_v=120 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=medium, horiz. |e_level=5 }} ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr3400 ''WNDR3400'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=159779 ''CFE and /proc/kmsg dump'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] ===Third party firmware=== *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/download/44198/DD-WRT-for-NETGEAR-WNDR3400v2/ ''Tathagata Das'''s DD-WRT build for WNDR3400v2] ===FreshTomato Information=== *[https://freshtomato.org/ ''To Know About FreshTomato''] ===FreshTomato Instructions=== *[https://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/w-i-p-wndr3400v2-development.77559/#post-337553 ''Flashing Instructions link''] ===download link=== *[https://freshtomato.org/downloads/freshtomato-mips/ ''Use newer builds navigate by year, year-build#, K26RT-N, Netgear WNDR-series folder there are two builds MiniIPv6, VPN''] ===Linksysinfo forum=== *[https://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php ''for support create an account for tomato firmware''] ===Other=== *[http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 Some units seem to be using a 84:1B:5E OUI] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wndr3400_v2}} {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr3400}} 14.07 Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The pinout is [http://techinfodepot.info/wiki/Netgear_WNDR3400 the same as the v1]. 
<--- to BCM5358U             
          J41
     (•) (Rx) (•)  (•)  (Tx)  (GND)
{{/Serial info}} ===nvram show=== {{/nvram}} ===CFE=== *[http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Common_Firmware_Environment CFE] is available [https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/files/CFE/NETGEAR/WNDR3400v2/cfe.bin here] (files/CFE/NETGEAR/WNDR3400v2/cfe.bin) ==Pictures==
